alert.note: Alert for Dauphin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN DAUPHIN COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Progress, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Hershey, Colonial Park, Progress, Middletown, Palmyra, Linglestown, Steelton, Hummelstown, Paxtonia, Rutherford, Skyline View, Lawnton, Campbelltown, Bressler-Enhaut-Oberlin, Penbrook, Highspire, Paxtang, Royalton and Penn National Race Course. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
